snippet.title: Discovery Freelancer Multiplayer - Official v5.0 Release Gameplay Trailer - Play Now!
snippet.description:
https://discoverygc.com/forums/showthread.php?tid=126999 👈🚀 Start Playing Discovery Freelancer Multiplayer - Easily download it today!

Official gameplay video and introduction for Discovery Freelancer. Download and play for free, immersing yourself in the longest running, spaceship MMORPG of all time!

Experience space exploration, immense PvE and PvP combat, multiple professions and activities, as well as a thriving player economy. The ever-expanding sandbox of Freelancer allows you to choose your own unique space adventure from countless options.

• An official 24/7 roleplay server, hosting up to 200 players.
• An expansion of the vanilla lore, 33 years on from the original campaign.
• Player owned and operated space stations.
• 100+ new ships, ranging from light fighters up to massive dreadnoughts.
• Brand new high quality sound and visual effects to add immersive weight to combat.
• Advanced experimental technologies, including cloaking devices and jump drives.
• Brand new systems and mysteries to explore, including a 5th House and perilous alien frontiers.

• Forums - https://discoverygc.com/forums/index.php
🚀 Installation Guide - https://discoverygc.com/forums/showthread.php?tid=126999
• Aid for Returning Veterans - https://discoverygc.com/forums/showthread.php?tid=151935
• News and Announcements - https://discoverygc.com/forums/forumdisplay.php?fid=13
• Discord Invite Link - https://discord.com/invite/FdSkbZ8 

- - - 

Special thanks to:
1. Jammi (https://bit.ly/3MhKYDL) for script support and transport footage
2. Antonio (https://bit.ly/3SjbAZ3) for combat footage - YouTube: @croattt 
3. The Discovery community for kicking ass well into 2020-2030!

Songs used:
1. First Light by Pedro Macedo Camacho (feat. Julie Elven)
2. Microsoft Flight Simulator - Japan World by Finishing Move Inc.

Video made by Avalanche (https://tinyurl.com/Avalanche-Forum)
